page.title: 17Debbie's Day in Woking.
page.content: I am 11 years old and live in Grange Park, Horsell with my parents and 8 year old sister,Kate. A typical day: 6.20 Daddy gets up and has breakfast. 6.30 Teasmade goes. Kate & I go into Mummy's bed for a cup of tea. 7.00 We all get up. Mummy has a bath and we get dressed. Daddy shaves. 7.25 Mummy dries her hair. We all wash Daddy dresses and goes to work. 7.40 We have breakfast-readybrek,toast 7.50 I pack my case for school. 7.55 Kate & I play or read.Mummy does housework. 8.15 I start walking to school. 8.30 Kate leaves for school with Mummy 9.00-5.00 School.Kate finishes at 3.45 5.15 Play outside unless it is raining 6.00 Tea-Jacket potatoes,salad,lasagne pizza,sandwiches,fruit,chips. 6.30 Go back outside. 8.00 Kate's bedtime. 8.30 I go to bed.
